name: Halong Bay 2 days 1 night on Cristina Diamond Cruise
description: Cristina Cruise 4 star best service Halong Bay is a traditional sail boat, built of wood with modern facilities and firt class service, is perfect for exploring Halong Bay on Cristina Cruise. The main food in  Cristina Cruise is Vietnam traditional dishes made of local seafood. Besides, exprerienced cooks of Cristina Cruise will bring to you other delicious dishes from beef, chicken with fresh herbs and spices in set menu.
